project_context.target_audience: Individuals needing financial documents (pay stubs, bank statements)
project_context.design_inspiration: Kikoff (Clean, Fintech, Approachable) mixed with Swiss Poster Design
project_context.theme_strategy: Light Mode (Primary) - evokes paper, officiality, and clarity. Dark Mode available for 'Control Room' dashboard view.

rules: Overlines MUST be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body
Do NOT use Inter for headings

primary.description: Deep Forest Green - Represents money, stability, old-world security

secondary.description: Pale Mint - For backgrounds of active states

accent.description: Electric Lime - The 'Anti-AI' twist. Use sparingly for primary CTAs to break the boring bank vibe.

rules: Primary CTAs should use the Accent color (Electric Lime) with black text for high visibility, OR Primary color (Forest Green) with white text for authority.
Gradients: Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle noise textures instead.

layout_strategy.spacing_scale: Tailwind Scale (p-4, p-8, p-12, p-16, p-24, p-32)
layout_strategy.container_padding: p-6 or p-8 for bordered containers

landing_page.name: The Tetris Grid
landing_page.rules: Asymmetry is key. Use col-span-8 for hero, col-span-4 for supporting visuals. Leave empty cells for breathing room.

form_page.name: The Control Room
form_page.rules: Split screen: Left side (Inputs) col-span-4 or 5. Right side (Live Preview) col-span-8 or 7. Sticky right side.

instructions: Use Shadcn UI for all interactive form elements (Input, Select, DatePicker, Dialog).
Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Swiss Forest' palette (Square corners or tight rounded-md).
Use Custom HTML/Tailwind for 'Document Preview Cards' and 'Hero Sections'.
Buttons: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-md). No pill shapes for this financial aesthetic.

specific_components.card: Use 'Tracing Beam' style for document selection cards. A subtle border that glows on hover.
specific_components.inputs: High contrast borders. Focus state: Ring with Primary color.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle 'noise' opacity-5 overlay to the background to simulate paper texture.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for the sticky header: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-black/5.

selected_assets.description: Minimalist desk with calculator and notebook. Use as a subtle background or side visual.
Padlock on black surface. Use for the 'Secure Payment' section.
Professional woman with laptop. Use for testimonials or success page.

images.rules: Images should be treated as 'Objects' on the grid, not just backgrounds. Give them borders or shadow frames.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Dark text on light bg.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes (e.g., data-testid='pay-stub-submit').

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Do NOT use gradients for text.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a document generation app. Focus on the 'Form Filling' experience. It should feel like filling out a high-end tax returnâ€”precise, clear, and satisfying. The 'Live Preview' of the document is the star of the show. Make sure the PDF generation logic (backend) is connected to the frontend form state.
